skillTree.name: Obedience Brings Victory!
skillTree.description: Orders must be followed and the chain of command honoured; only then will the Great Plan be served.

skillTree.name: Reptilian Resilience
skillTree.description: A low body temperature means the Lizardmen can operate normally in environments which would overwhelm lesser races.

skillTree.name: Protection of the Old Ones
skillTree.description: Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.

skillTree.name: Legendary Warrior
skillTree.description: Nakai's very presence indicates that a battle of great importance will soon occur.

skillTree.name: Daemon Crusher
skillTree.description: So many Daemons of Chaos have been slain by Nakai that such entities fear to tread the same ground as him.

skillTree.name: Cold-Blooded Reflexes
skillTree.description: Slowly, carefully, the serpent uncoils, before striking suddenly – like lightning – and sinking its fangs as far as they will go.

skillTree.name: First Spawning
skillTree.description: Revered as a jungle-spirit made manifest, ancient Nakai is the last of the First Spawning, and fights with the Old Ones' long-dormant fury.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units

skillTree.name: Adornments
skillTree.description: Nakai is treated with deference by the Skink Priests, who adorn his massive, battle-scarred body with ceremonial tokens when he returns from the fray.

skillTree.name: The Sacred Wanderer
skillTree.description: This mighty protector of the Lizardmen race is pledged to go wherever the Great Plan deems it necessary for him to be.

skillTree.name: Predatory Fighter
skillTree.description: Of course, those who live to kill must also kill to live...

skillTree.name: Enforcer of Order
skillTree.description: The Plan *will* be observed, even if every member of the younger races has to die to achieve the Old Ones' goals.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Skaven
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Wild-Eyed
skillTree.description: "Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Miasma of Despair
skillTree.description: Being able to slow the foe, drain it of energy and the will to fight on, is a mighty power to wield.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Impassioned
skillTree.description: There is nothing but utter belief. There is no reasoning with this one.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Aura of Inertia
skillTree.description: The enemy aren't going anywhere fast – in fact, they're not going anywhere at all!

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Proud Warrior
skillTree.description: A long-serving member of an ancient, honourable tradition.

skillTree.name: Skirmisher
skillTree.description: This seasoned warrior understands irregular combat perfectly: when to attack, when to hold back, when to withdraw behind heavier lines.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +6% for Salamander Hunting Pack units
Weapon strength: +6% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Red Crested Skink units
Missile strength: +6% for Salamander Hunting Pack units
Missile strength: +4% for Skink and Chameleon Skink units
Melee defence: +4 for Salamander Hunting Pack units
Melee defence: +4 for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Red Crested Skink units
Weapon strength: +9% for Salamander Hunting Pack units
Weapon strength: +9% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Red Crested Skink units
Missile strength: +6% for Salamander Hunting Pack units
Missile strength: +6% for Skink and Chameleon Skink units
Melee defence: +6 for Salamander Hunting Pack units
Melee defence: +6 for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Red Crested Skink units
Weapon strength: +12% for Salamander Hunting Pack units
Weapon strength: +12% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Red Crested Skink units
Missile strength: +8% for Salamander Hunting Pack units
Missile strength: +8% for Skink and Chameleon Skink units

skillTree.name: Swift Rider
skillTree.description: Only the finest beast riders can hang on whilst their mounts crash through the jungle undergrowth or smash through the foe's ranks.

effects.description: Speed: +5% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders and Cold One units
Speed: +7% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders and Cold One units
Weapon strength: +6% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders and Cold One units
Missile strength: +6% for Terradon Riders units
Speed: +10% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders and Cold One units
Weapon strength: +8% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders and Cold One units
Missile strength: +8% for Terradon Riders units

skillTree.name: Sacred Guardian
skillTree.description: It is a great honour to direct the elite warriors who protect the Plan from calamity.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Kroxigors and Temple Guards units
Melee attack: +4 for Kroxigors and Temple Guards units
Melee defence: +4 for Kroxigors and Temple Guards units
Melee attack: +6 for Kroxigors and Temple Guards units
Melee defence: +6 for Kroxigors and Temple Guards units

skillTree.name: Hunt Leader
skillTree.description: The most intelligent hunter tends to move swiftly up the chain of command.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Feral Carnosaur units
Melee attack: +6 for Feral Carnosaur units
Weapon strength: +9% for Feral Carnosaur units
Melee attack: +8 for Feral Carnosaur units
Weapon strength: +12% for Feral Carnosaur units

skillTree.name: Beast Driver
skillTree.description: The largest, most aggressive creatures - usually the oldest bulls of the herd - must be directed, lest their independent spirit lead them astray.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +6% for Stegadon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Missile strength: +4% for Stegadon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Melee defence: +4 for Stegadon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Weapon strength: +9% for Stegadon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Missile strength: +6% for Stegadon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Melee defence: +6 for Stegadon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Weapon strength: +12% for Stegadon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Missile strength: +8% for Stegadon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units

skillTree.name: Jungle Dominion
skillTree.description: The unforgiving law of the jungle is most clear on matters of ascendancy.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +12% for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
Spell resistance: 15% for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Spawn-Kin
skillTree.description: Braves who emerge from the same spawning often share a deep connection – a bond which provides considerable advantages in battle.

effects.description: Leadership: +5 for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander Hunting Pack and Kroxigors units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +5 for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander Hunting Pack and Kroxigors units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander Hunting Pack and Kroxigors units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Soul Bound
skillTree.description: Mount and rider, together as one at their very cores. Indivisible.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Cold One, Terradon Riders and Ripperdactyl units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +5 for Cold One, Terradon Riders and Ripperdactyl Riders units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for Cold One, Terradon Riders and Ripperdactyl Riders units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Epicentrist
skillTree.description: You need to be at the very centre of this pack of furious monsters to have the minutest chance of controlling their rage. Good luck!

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon and Feral Carnosaur units (Rank 7 and above)
Leadership: +5 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon and Feral Carnosaur units (Rank 7 and above)
Charge bonus: +12 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon and Feral Carnosaur units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Spawned of Itza
skillTree.description: A Lord from the Lizardmen's hallowed First City can summon his spawn-kin to battle in Lustria's defence.

skillTree.name: Fervent
skillTree.description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.

skillTree.name: Bonded Service
skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

skillTree.name: Ancient Cunning
skillTree.description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Geomantic Sustenance
skillTree.description: The power generated by the overarching Geomantic Web can also be used to nourish the Saurus on the march.

skillTree.name: Wary
skillTree.description: This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.

skillTree.name: Gifts of the Jungle
skillTree.description: Life in the jungle means knowing the difference between which flora can heal and what, if ingested, will kill you.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

skillTree.name: First Spawn
skillTree.description: Revered as the living embodiment of the jungle, Nakai is an ancient Kroxigor compelled to defend Lustria wherever and whenever it is threatened.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -15% for Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units
Melee defence: +5 for Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units

items.name: Golden Tributes
items.description: Every trinket adorning the Wanderer’s massive, battle-scarred body is a testament to the countless battles that he has fought.

items.name: The Ogham Shard
items.description: The shard is a fractured piece of one of the original Ogham Waystones, whose mystical properties may keep Chaos at bay.
